questions.uddipok:
Change the sentences according to directions.
(a) Corruption is a great curse to our nation. (Complex)
(b) No other problem is so great as corruption. (Comparative)
(c) It prevails in every walks of our life. (Complex)
(d) It destroys everything. (Negative)
(e) It can be compared to cancer. (Active)
(f) It paralyses the whole nation. (Passive)
(g) We must realize the fact and come forward against corruption. (Simple)
(h) We must have to create awareness among the people to get rid of this problem. (Complex)
(i) Both the government and the people should work together. (Compound)
(j) Educated people cannot avoid the responsibility of solving this problem. (Interrogative)

sub_questions.explanation:
(a) It is corruption which is a great curse to our nation.
(b) Corruption is greater than any other problem.
(c) Every walks of our life is the arena where it prevails./It is every walks of our life where it prevails.
(d) It doesn't create/produce anything.
(e) We can compare it to cancer.
(f) The whole nation is paralyzed by it.
(g) Realizing the fact, we must come forward against corruption.
(h) We must have to create awareness among the people so that we can get rid of this problem.
(i) Both the government and the people should work and they should work together.
(j) Can educated people avoid the responsibility of solving this problem?

questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on " The Benefits of Early Rising ".

sub_questions.explanation: Early rising offers numerous benefits, both physically and mentally, helping individuals lead more productive and healthy lives. Waking up early allows for a head start on the day, providing time for a calm and peaceful morning routine before the hustle and bustle begins. This time can be used for exercise, meditation, or planning the day, which can boost energy levels and focus throughout the day. Early risers often find that their minds are clearer and more focused in the morning, which enhances concentration and decision-making. Additionally, rising early provides the opportunity to enjoy a quiet environment, leading to less stress and distraction. Research also shows that early risers tend to have better physical health, as they are more likely to establish healthy habits like a balanced breakfast, physical exercise, and consistent sleep schedules. Overall, early rising helps improve mental clarity, productivity, and physical well-being, creating a positive and proactive start to the day.

questions.uddipok: Bangladesh is a land of six seasons. Every season has its own special aspects. You have a great attraction for one of the seasons. Now, write a composition on "The Season You Like Most" . (250 words)

sub_questions.explanation:
The Season I Like Most
There are six seasons in Bangladesh, the land of natural beauty. They are summer, rainy, autumn, late autumn, winter and spring. Every season has its unique features. Of all these seasons I like the spring most. This season consists of the Bangla months of Falgun and Chaitra. It is the best, the loveliest and the most charming of all the seasons. There are some specific reaons why I'like the spring most.
To me, the winter is very cold, dull and lifeless. In summer, the scorching sun, hot days and nights make life miserable. The heavy rain and frequent floods in the rainy season bring great sufferings to the people. The autumn and the late autumn have also more or less the disadvantages like the summer, rainy and winter seasons. But the spring has none of the inconveniences of these seasons. Coming after winter, it captivates the hearts of all.
With the arrival of the spring, nature puts on a lively look. Everything in the nature looks fresh. The sky looks clear and blue, trees put forth new leaves, and the flowers of charming colour and scent bloom in trees. Bees and butterflies hum and fly from one flower to another. During this season, gentle breeze begins to blow. Sweet twitters of birds are heard. The melodious notes of the cuckoo please our ears. All these charming and pleasing sights and sounds have a positive influence on our mind. Everywhere there is joy and mirth. People also enjoy a better health. Besides, during this time, various kinds of vegetables and, fruits are also available. The season has a few disadvantages, too: During this season, some people suffer from diseases like diarrhoea, cholera, chicken-pox, etc.
In spite of its few disadvantages, its positive aspects are overwhelming. The convenience it offers fascinates all. That's why, I like the spring season most.
